sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new region to the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Region' section to navigate to the 'Region' page.
On the 'Region' page, click the '+' button located at the top right corner.
A popup will appear with two fields. Enter the 'Region Name' and select a value from the 'Status' dropdown (Active / Non-Active). Finally, click the 'Add' button.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new area to the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Area' section to navigate to the 'Area' page.
On the 'Area' page, click the '+' button located at the top right corner.

A popup will appear with three fields: 'Select Region' (dropdown), 'Area Name' (input), and 'Status' (dropdown). Select a region, enter the area name (e.g., Peshawar, Islamabad), choose a status, and click 'Add'.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new territory to the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Territory' section to navigate to the 'Territory' page.
On the 'Territory' page, click the '+' button located at the top right corner.
A popup will appear with four fields: 'Select Region', 'Select Area', 'Territory Name', and 'Status'. Select the appropriate values and click 'Add'.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new town to the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Town' section to navigate to the 'Town' page.
On the 'Town' page, click the '+' button located at the top right corner.
A popup will appear with three fields: 'Select Territory', 'Town Name', and 'Status'. Select a territory, enter the town name, choose the status, and click 'Add'.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new city to the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'City' section to navigate to the 'City' page.
On the 'City' page, click the '+' button located at the top right corner.
A popup will appear with three fields: 'Select Territory', 'Town Name', and 'Status'. Select a territory, enter the town name, choose the status, and click 'Add'.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new distributor to the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Distributor' section to navigate to the 'Distributor' page.
On the 'Distributor' page, click the '+' button located at the top right corner.

A popup will appear with 29 fields, including dropdowns for 'Select Region', 'Select Area', 'Select Territory', and inputs such as 'Distributor', 'Contact Person Name', 'FBR Title', 'Distributor Address', 'Province', 'Check-In Radius', and 'GST Value'. Fill in all required details and click 'Add' to save the distributor.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new section to the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Sections' option to navigate to the 'Sections' page.
On the 'Sections' page, click the '+' button at the top right corner.
A popup will appear with fields for 'Select Town', 'Section Name', and 'Status'. Select the town, enter the section name (e.g., Bannu), choose the status, and click 'Add'.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new sector to the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Sectors' option to navigate to the 'Sectors' page.
On the 'Sectors' page, click the '+' button located at the top right corner.
A popup will appear with five fields: 'Select Distributor', 'Select Town', 'Select Section', 'Select Sector', and 'Status'. Fill out all fields and click 'Add'.

sections.description: This section guides the user through searching for an existing region.

steps.description: Click on the 'Region' section to navigate to the 'Region' page.
On the 'Region' page, click the 'Search' field located at the top left corner.
Type the region name you want to search. If it exists, it will appear in the list.

Click the 'Search' field located at the top left corner.
Type the area you want to search. If found, it will be displayed.

sections.description: This section guides the user through searching for an existing Distributor Zones.

steps.description: Click on the 'Distributor Zones' section to navigate to the 'Distributor Zones' page.
Select value from 'Select Distributor' then click the 'Search' button
If data exists for that particular distributor zone you will see it in the list.
